experiment_info.purpose: GPT-4.1重新运行：使用Run 8相同prompt配置测试GPT-4.1性能

The child crosses the path of the observer vehicle, creating an immediate collision risk. The adult on the right sidewalk remains stationary or walking, not entering the road. The rest of the road is clear, with a red car ahead in the distance and no other immediate hazards.",

The observer vehicle must react immediately to avoid a collision with the child.",
  "key_objects": "1) Large white obstruction (covered vehicle or structure) on the right sidewalk, which blocks the view of the child until the moment of emergence. 2) Child running from right to left across the road, directly in the vehicle's path. 3) Adult male on the right sidewalk, not entering the road. 4) White car passing on the left side of the road. 5) Red car ahead in the same lane, moving away from the observer vehicle.",
  "key_actions": "ghost probing",
